synopsis.text: Pops, the relentless Inspector Zenigata, is in hot water as he's accused of being the secret mastermind behind Lupin's heists. To clear Zenigata's name and restore his own tarnished reputation, Lupin is goaded into stealing the enigmatic Time Crystal, a powerful supercomputer engine that can crack secure passwords at an unprecedented speed. The challenge comes from Roy Forest, a wealthy and influential magnate with a sinister agenda. As Lupin embarks on this new mission, he's faced with a shocking betrayal from his trusted ally, Daisuke Jigen. Meanwhile, a young piano virtuoso, Alisa Cartwright, is kidnapped and forced to work for Roy Forest under threat of death. Lupin, Goemon, and the rest of the gang find themselves entangled in a dangerous plot of global proportions. As they navigate this complex web of intrigue, they must confront Jigen, now their strongest rival, in an epic showdown. What secrets lie behind Jigen's betrayal, and how does it all connect to the Time Crystal and the kidnapped piano prodigy? Only time will tell in this thrilling adventure.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
